attributes.action: Stop idiots starting petitions about ridiculous stuff and check their facts before starting to waste everyone's time with spurious petitions!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long idiots have had the right to go around starting petitions. I propose stopping petitions being started until someone intelligent has checked the facts. Then the facts must have been verified by at least three mates down the pub , because they will of course know, before the petition can be authorised.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
